Game of Thrones: KING'S LANDING - JOFFREY'S WEDDING - DAY CERSEI

Season 4 Episode 3 Script Opening Titles: Clawing at his own throat, looking to his mother to make stop

Our alliance with the Lannisters remains every bit as necessary to them as it is unpleasant for us

Season 4 Episode 3 Script Opening Titles: This is hardly the place or the time
